successes.title: Achtung! Cthulhu - The WW2 Keeper's & Investigator's Guides
successes.description: A terrifying World War Two setting for the Call of Cthulhu & Savage Worlds roleplaying games. The Secret War has begun!

Pledges.description: MINION: (Approx $7.50 US) Big Love from Modiphius for your support, and your name included in both books in the Kickstarter credits. Higher level backers will be listed under their appropriate Reward name. You will also receive a private link to download high res Wallpaper of selected artwork AND a copy of John Houlihan's 60 page novella, The Trellborg Monstrosities for Achtung! Cthulhu on PDF!
PDF INVESTIGATOR'S GUIDE: (Approx $15 US) Minion Reward Level PLUS a PDF copy of the Investigator's Guide
PDF KEEPER'S GUIDE: (Approx $23 US) Minion Reward Level PLUS a PDF copy of the Keeper's Guide

PRINTED INVESTIGATOR'S GUIDE (Approx $23 US) PDF Investigator's Guide Reward Level PLUS a print copy of the Investigator's Guide. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)
PDF MASTER: (Approx $31 US) Minion Reward Level PLUS a PDF copy of the Investigators AND the Keeper's Guide in PDF!

PRINTED KEEPER'S GUIDE (Approx $39 US) PDF Keeper's Guide PLUS A print copy of the Keeper's Guide. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

ALLIED INVESTIGATOR MINIATURES - (Approx $39) Minion Reward Level PLUS a set of 6 Allied Investigator's in 28mm Pewter lead free metal. Get extra miniatures with Add On's. Please add £5 shipping within the UK, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (including USA).

CTHULHU CREATURE MINIATURES- (Approx $39) Minion Reward Level PLUS a set of 6 Cthulhu Creatures in 28mm Pewter lead free metal. Get extra miniatures with Add On's. Please add £5 shipping within the UK, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (including USA)

WEIRD PDF MASTER: (Approx $46 US) Minion Reward Level PLUS a PDF copy of the Investigators AND the Keeper's Guide AND a PDF copy of Weird War 2 for Savage Worlds by Pinnacle Entertainment (worth $25)!
PDF MASTER BONUS! (Approx $54 US) PDF Master Reward level *** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***.

PRINT MASTER (Approx $62 US) PDF Master Reward level PLUS A print copy of the Keeper's Guide and a print copy of the Investigator's Guide *** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

HEROES & CREATURES! - (Approx $70) Minion Reward Level PLUS a set of 6 Allied Investigator's and 6 Cthulhu Creatures in 28mm Pewter lead free metal! Get extra miniatures with Add On's. Please add £8 shipping within the UK, £15 shipping if in Europe or rest of the world (including USA)

GENEROUS KEEPER (Approx $108 US) Print Master Reward Level plus 3 Extra copies of the Investigator's Guide. Please add £10 shipping within the UK and USA, £15 shipping if in rest of Europe, £20 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

WORLDWIDE KEEPER (Approx $124 US) Print Master Reward Level plus print copies of the Eastern Front Guide, The North African Guide and the Pacific Guide. To ship all books together when completed please add £15 shipping within the UK and USA, £20 shipping if in rest of Europe, £30 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). To ship books in two phases (Investigator & Keeper's Guide then the 3 setting guides) please add £20 shipping within the UK and USA, £30 shipping if in rest of Europe, £40 rest of the world (outside EU & USA).

ULTIMATE GAMER! - (Approx $130) PDF Master Bonus Level (yes that's ALL the PDF's!) PLUS a set of 6 Allied Investigator's, 6 Cthulhu Creatures and 10 Nazi Zombies in 28mm Pewter lead free metal! Get extra miniatures with Add On's. Please add £8 shipping within the UK, £15 shipping in Europe, £20 shipping in the rest of the world (including USA)

CAMPAIGN KEEPER (Approx $140 US) Print Master Reward Level plus print copies of the Shadows of Atlantis Campaign & The Assault on the Mountains of Madness Campaign. To ship all books together when completed please add £15 shipping within the UK and USA, £20 shipping if in rest of Europe, £35 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). To ship books in two phases (Investigator & Keeper's Guide then the 2 campaigns) please add £20 shipping within the UK and USA, £30 shipping if in rest of Europe, £45 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). Postage prices are unfortunately high for such heavy books.

ART INVESTIGATOR (Approx $155 US) Print Investigator Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn in to one of the illustrations of Allied heroes within the Investigator's Guide by Dim Martin PLUS your name used within the storyline or background material.*** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

ART KEEPER (Approx $155 US) Print Keeper Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn in as one of the Villains illustrations within the Keeper's Guide by Dim Martin PLUS your name used within the storyline or background material.*** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

LIMITED EDITION PRINT MASTER (Approx $155 US) PDF Master Reward level PLUS a copy of the Secret War Limited Edition (leather effect hardback with gold edged pages combining the Keeper and Investigator's Guides). See Update no. 24 for pictures***PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You can add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons ***. Please add £10 shipping within the UK, £15 shipping in USA & Europe, £25 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

THE KEEPER OF SECRETS (Approx $140 US) Print Master Reward Level Plus print copies of the Shadows of Atlantis Campaign & The Assault on the Mountains of Madness Campaign Plus print copies of the Eastern Front Guide, the North African Guide and the Pacific Guide. That's 1256 printed pages of The Secret War! To ship all books together when completed please add £25 shipping within the UK and USA, £35 shipping if in rest of Europe, £60 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). To ship books in two phases (Investigator & Keeper's Guide then the 2 campaigns and 3 setting guides) please add £40 shipping within the UK and USA, £55 shipping if in rest of Europe, £80 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). Postage prices are unfortunately high for such heavy books.

HERO INVESTIGATOR (Approx $233 US) Print Investigator Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn as one of the new character professions within the Investigator's Guide.*** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

EASTERN FRONT ART (Approx $233 US) Print Master Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn in as one of the Heroes or Villains illustrations (your choice) within the Eastern Front Guide by Dim Martin *** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. PDF's of books will be sent as soon as they are ready. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

SHADOWS OF ATLANTIS ART (Approx $233 US) Print Master Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn in as one of the Heroes or Villains illustrations within the Shadows of Atlantis Campaign by Dim Martin PLUS Your name included in the storyline or background material *** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. PDF's of books will be sent as soon as they are ready. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA) FURTHER ART REWARDS WILL BE UNLOCKED AS THE CAMPAIGN IS UNLOCKED!

NORTH AFRICAN GUIDE ART (Approx $233 US) Print Master Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn in as one of the Heroes or Villains illustrations (your choice) within the North African & Middle East Guide by Dim Martin *** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. PDF's of books will be sent as soon as they are ready. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

PACIFIC FRONT ART (Approx $233 US) Print Master Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn in as one of the Heroes or Villains illustrations (your choice) within the Pacifc Front Guide by Dim Martin *** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. PDF's of books will be sent as soon as they are ready. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA)

PRINT MASTER LIMITED EDITION INVESTIGATOR'S KIT (Approx $232) PDF Master Reward Level PLUS the Secret War Investigator's Kit: a copy of the Secret War Limited Edition book (leather effect hardback with gold edged pages combining the Keeper & Investigator's Guides, a KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE Investigator's Leather & Canvas Bag, and a set of 3 Posters (Secret War Map, The Keeper's Guide Cover and our Propaganda Poster). See update No.24 for pictures and more info).***PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You can add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. These are also available as Add Ons. Please add £10 UK, £25 USA & Europe, £40 Rest of World (outside of EU & USA)

KEEPER OF TERRORS (Approx $280 US) Keeper of Secrets Level (1256 printed pages of The Secret War plus PDF Stretch Goals including the Floorplan Tiles) PLUS six 28mm Allied Investigators, six 28mm Cthulhu Creatures and ten 28mm Nazi Zombies in lead free Pewter metal. To ship all items together when completed please add £10 shipping within the UK, £25 within the USA or rest of Europe, £40 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). To ship in two phases (Investigator & Keeper's Guide plus Miniatures, then the 2 campaigns and 3 setting guides) please add £16 shipping within the UK, £40 within the USA and in rest of Europe, £60 rest of the world (outside EU & USA).

ASSAULT ON THE MOUNTAINS OF MADNESS ART (Approx $310 US) Print Master Reward Level PLUS your likeness drawn in as one of the Heroes or Villains illustrations (your choice) within Assault on the Mountains of Madness by Dim Martin or Korungn *** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***. PDF's of books will be sent as soon as they are ready. Please add £5 shipping within the UK and USA, £10 shipping if in rest of Europe, £15 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). More pledges will be unlocked as the campaign is unlocked.

MASTER HERO OR VILLAIN ART- (Approx $1,000) - The Keeper of Secret's Level PLUS Get drawn in as a recurring character in: Shadows of Atlantis, Assault on the Mountains of Madness, Easter Front Guide, North African Guide & the Pacific Guide. We will create a hero or villain based on your likeness that will appear in artwork in all the listed books, mentioned in the background material and a PDF pre-generated character sheet with the character's history for you to use in your games and to appear in a future adventure. For one shipment when everything is printed please add £10 shipping within the UK, £16 in the USA, £25 shipping if in rest of Europe, £40 rest of the world (outside EU & USA). For split shipments (Investigator's & Keeper's Guide, then the rest of the books) please add £16 shipping in UK & USA, £40 Shipping in Europe and Rest of the World.

LEGENDARY PLAYER - (Approx $3,100) Generous Keeper Reward Level PLUS You and 3 friends will play a whole adventure over a series of 3 x 3 hours sessions on Google Meet Up or Skype with some of the writing team. You and your 3 friends will be drawn in as the pre-generated characters, as well as drawn into a minimum of 1 extra piece of art each and you will each receive the published adventure in print and PDF with the actual events of the story written up as a short story to accompany the adventure in PDF. The experience will be delivered during September-December 2013, the finished adventure approximately Spring 2014.*** PLUS a copy of every book in PDF funded by Stretch Goals. You will be able to add print copies of Stretch Goals using Add Ons***
